lead_paragraph: When the Marlins intentionally walked Brandon Crawford to bring up pitcher Jeff Samardzija in the No. 8 hole, Giants manager Bruce Bochy second-guessed whether this might have been a night to bat his starter in the typical ninth slot.

headline.print_headline: Righty Jeff Samardzija Drives in 3 Runs, Wins Home Debut
headline.main: Righty Jeff Samardzija Drives in 3 Runs, Wins Home Debut
